title: Trumpcast: A Clownish Attempt at a Coup
description:
Virginia Heffernan welcomes back Jacob Weisberg, founder of Trumpcast and CEO of Pushkin Industries, and talks about the outrageousness of Trump’s coup attempt—however ridiculous it may be—and why we’re still going to be OK, sorting out our feelings after election week, and a bookend to that fateful election night four years ago.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
